title: Declare a Number Variable
description:
Declare the number variable and then output the value of it. Then run your program.

Your program should output the following text.

Example number: 15.8
hint: Drag the two blocks in the tray over to the program to declare the variable and output its value. The first block in the tray declares a variable with a number type and assigns it the value of 15.8. The second block displays a short message and the value.
